title: Did President Donald Trump Amend an Executive Order to Recall 1,000 Retired Air Force Pilots?
subtitle: Despite rumors, the President did not recall a thousand retired Air Force pilots by amending Executive Order 13223.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Trump amended Executive Order 13223, recalling 1,000 retired Air Force pilots in a "mini draft" and in preparation for imminent war.
